@graph.name: How to Export Shopify Collections in OptizenAI
@graph.description: Step-by-step instructions for exporting your Shopify collection data to CSV format using OptizenAI's export functionality.

supply.name: OptizenAI Account
supply.description: Active OptizenAI subscription with collection access

step.name: Access Collections Dashboard
step.text: Navigate to the Collections section in your OptizenAI dashboard

step.name: Select Collections to Export
step.text: Choose the specific collections you want to export or select all collections

step.name: Click Export Button
step.text: Click the Export button and choose CSV format for your collection data

step.name: Configure Export Settings
step.text: Select which data fields to include in your export file

step.name: Download Export File
step.text: Download the generated CSV file containing your collection data

@graph.name: Collection Export Learning Module
@graph.description: Master the process of exporting Shopify collection data for various business purposes

about.name: Shopify Collection Management
about.description: Data export and management for e-commerce collections

mainEntity.name: What data is included in the collection export?

acceptedAnswer.text: The collection export includes collection names, descriptions, SEO titles, meta descriptions, handles, product counts, and all associated metadata. You can customize which fields to include in your export.

mainEntity.name: Can I export specific collections or must I export all?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can choose to export specific collections by selecting them individually, or export all collections at once. The selection interface allows for bulk selection and filtering options.

mainEntity.name: What file formats are available for export?

acceptedAnswer.text: Currently, OptizenAI supports CSV format for collection exports. This format is compatible with Excel, Google Sheets, and most data processing tools for easy manipulation and analysis.

mainEntity.name: How can I use the exported collection data?

acceptedAnswer.text: Exported collection data can be used for backup purposes, bulk editing in spreadsheet applications, migration to other platforms, data analysis, and creating reports on your collection performance.

mainEntity.name: Is there a limit to how many collections I can export?

acceptedAnswer.text: There are no artificial limits on the number of collections you can export. The system will export all selected collections regardless of quantity, though very large exports may take longer to process.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Collection Export
hasDefinedTerm.description: The process of extracting Shopify collection data into a downloadable file format for external use

hasDefinedTerm.name: CSV Format
hasDefinedTerm.description: Comma-Separated Values file format that organizes data in rows and columns, compatible with spreadsheet applications

hasDefinedTerm.name: Bulk Editing
hasDefinedTerm.description: The process of making changes to multiple collections simultaneously using exported data

hasDefinedTerm.name: Collection Handle
hasDefinedTerm.description: The unique URL identifier for a Shopify collection, used in web addresses and API calls

hasDefinedTerm.name: Meta Description
hasDefinedTerm.description: HTML attribute providing a brief summary of collection content for search engines and social media
